content: Copying several files to the Form Filling room is not supported. Copy one {{ organizationName }} PDF form at a time.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when copying multiple files to a Form Filling room in an application. It informs users that this action is not supported and suggests copying one PDF form at a time instead. This message appears on a UI component for the FilesSelector, likely as a warning or alert when users attempt to copy multiple files simultaneously.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'bir-bir' is redundant and stylistically awkward. It translates to 'one by one' but is not necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Forma Doldurma otağına çoxsaylı faylların nüsxələnməsi dəstəklənmir. {{ organizationName }} PDF formalarını bir-birinə nüsxələyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a lower case 'k' at the beginning of 'kopírování', which is not ideal for a warning message. It should be capitalized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kopírování více souborů do místnosti pro vyplňování formulářů není podporováno. Kopírujte PDF formuláře {{ organizationName }} po jednom.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "sala para rellenar formularios" is not the most natural translation of 'Form Filling room'. A more accurate and common translation would be 'habitación de llenado de formularios' or simply 'habitación de formularios'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'habitación de llenado de formularios' or 'habitación de formularios' instead of 'sala para rellenar formularios'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Մի քանի ֆայլերի պատճենումը" (Copying several files) is grammatically correct, but 'ձևը' (the form) doesn't quite capture the intent of 'PDF form'. It's technically correct but lacks nuance. A more precise translation might consider the specific PDF context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մի քանի ֆայլերի պատճենումը Ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակում չի աջակցվում: Պատճենեք մեկ {{ organizationName }} PDF ֆայլը միաժամանակ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon (:) after the first sentence feels slightly abrupt. It could benefit from a smoother transition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մի քանի ֆայլերի պատճենումը Ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակում չի աջակցվում։ Խնդրում ենք պատճենեք մեկ {{ organizationName }} PDF ֆայլը միաժամանակ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "stanza di compilazione dei moduli" is a literal translation of "Form Filling room" and sounds unnatural in Italian. A more natural phrasing would be "stanza di compilazione moduli" or "area di compilazione moduli".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "stanza di compilazione moduli" or "area di compilazione moduli" instead of "stanza di compilazione dei moduli".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເອກະສານ' (documents) is repeated unnecessarily. While technically correct, it's stylistically awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສໍາເນົາເອກະສານຫລາຍໆເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫ້ອງຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນແບບຟອມແມ່ນບໍ່ຮັບຮອງ. ກວດເບິ່ງແບບຟອມ PDF ຂອງ {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງແບບຟອມໃນຄັ້ງຫນຶ່ງເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'ກວດເບິ່ງ' (check) might be better replaced with a more suitable word, as it implies an active review rather than the intended action of copying.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສໍາເນົາເອກະສານຫລາຍໆເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫ້ອງຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນແບບຟອມແມ່ນບໍ່ຮັບຮອງ. ຕື່ມແບບຟອມ PDF ຂອງ {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງແບບຟອມໃນຄັ້ງຫນຶ່ງເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "veidlapu aizpildīšanas telpu" translates to 'form filling room' but sounds unnatural in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be "veidlapu aizpildīšanas istabu" or simply "veidlapu istabu".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vairāku failu kopēšana uz veidlapu istabu netiek atbalstīta. Vienlaikus kopējiet vienu {{ organizationName }} PDF veidlapu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Copying several files' is translated as 'Não há suporte para copiar vários arquivos'. While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly translation would be 'Não é possível copiar vários arquivos' or 'A cópia de vários arquivos...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não é possível copiar vários arquivos

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable 'organizationName' is correctly placed, but ensuring consistent use of curly braces and spaces around the variable in all translated strings is recommended for future consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but maintain consistency in variable formatting across translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the original meaning. Specifically, the repetition of 'formulário PDF' is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não é possível copiar vários arquivos para a sala de preenchimento de formulários. Copie um formulário PDF {{ organizationName }} por vez.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Não há suporte para a cópia' is a bit formal for this context. A more natural phrasing could improve readability.

The phrase "Sala de completare a formularelor" is a literal translation of 'Form Filling room'. A more natural Romanian equivalent might be 'Camera de completare a formularelor' or 'Spațiul de completare a formularelor'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Camera de completare a formularelor' or 'Spațiul de completare a formularelor'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Copiați câte un formular PDF {{ organizationName }}." is technically correct, it's a bit clunky. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Copiați câte un PDF {{ organizationName}}' or 'Copiați un PDF {{ organizationName}} pe rând'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආකෘතියක්' (aakruthayak) should ideally be 'ආකෘතිය' (aakruthya) for better flow and conciseness. While 'ආකෘතියක්' isn't strictly wrong, 'ආකෘතිය' is more common and natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පෝරම් පිරවුම් කාමරයට බොහෝ ගොනු පිටපත් කිරීම සහය නොදක්වයි. එක {{ organizationName }} PDF ආකෘතිය පමණක් එකවර පිටපත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "một số tập tin" (several files) is awkward and less natural in Vietnamese. It's better to use a more fluent phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy sao chép từng biểu mẫu PDF {{ organizationName }} một lần.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "mỗi lần" is somewhat redundant. It can be removed without losing meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy sao chép từng biểu mẫu PDF {{ organizationName }} một.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Chinese translation uses 'PDF 表单' which is technically correct but could be more natural. Consider using 'PDF 文档' or simply 'PDF 文件' for a slightly more fluent feel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF 文档 or PDF 文件
